raw_response: {"answer_index": 1, "answer_text": "Rice (Oryza sativa).", "confidence": 8, "reasoning": "Among the listed organisms, rice (Oryza sativa) has approximately 40,000-50,000 genes, which is notably higher than mouse (~20,000-25,000 genes) and zebrafish (~26,000 genes).
